components.name: Accordion
components.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

components.name: AlertDialog
components.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content, requiring acknowledgement.

components.name: Alert
components.description: Displays a callout for user attention.

components.name: AspectRatio
components.description: Displays content within a fixed aspect ratio.

components.name: Avatar
components.description: An image element with a fallback for representing users or entities.

components.name: Badge
components.description: Displays a small badge or label, often used for status indicators.

components.name: Button
components.description: An interactive element triggering an action or navigation.

components.name: CalendarUpcoming
components.description: Displays upcoming campaign events in a calendar grid or timeline view.

components.name: Calendar
components.description: Displays a calendar grid allowing users to view dates and select single or multiple dates.

components.name: AssetCard
components.description: Card component displaying asset information with preview, title, platform, and budget using standard Card components.

components.name: KpiCard
components.description: A card component for displaying key performance indicators with trend visualization using standard Card components.

components.name: UpcomingCampaignsTable
components.description: Displays a table of upcoming campaigns within a card.

components.name: Card
components.description: A container for grouping related content and actions.

components.name: Carousel
components.description: Displays items in a scrollable container with previous/next controls.

components.name: AreaChart
components.description: A responsive area chart component for visualizing cumulative or quantitative data over time or categories.

components.name: BarChart
components.description: A responsive bar chart component for comparing categorical data, supporting horizontal and vertical layouts.

components.name: FunnelChart
components.description: A responsive funnel chart component for visualizing sequential data flows and conversion rates.

components.name: LineChart
components.description: Responsive line chart component based on Recharts with support for multiple data series.

components.name: PieChart
components.description: A responsive pie chart component for visualizing proportional data.

components.name: RadarChart
components.description: A responsive radar chart component for visualizing multivariate data across several categories.

components.name: ScatterChart
components.description: A responsive scatter chart component for visualizing correlations and distributions between two or three variables.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and unchecked states.

components.name: Collapsible
components.description: A content area that can be collapsed and expanded.

components.name: Command
components.description: Input component with filtering and keyboard navigation, often used for command palettes or searchable menus.

components.name: ContextMenu
components.description: Displays a menu associated with an element, typically triggered by a right-click or long-press.

components.name: DatePicker
components.description: Allows users to select a date from a calendar popover.

components.name: Dialog
components.description: A window overlaid on the primary window, rendering the content underneath inert.

components.name: DropdownMenu
components.description: Displays a menu to the user —such as a set of actions or functions— triggered by a button.

components.name: Form
components.description: Provides form context and helper components for building forms with validation, integrating with react-hook-form.

components.name: HoverCard
components.description: Displays a popover card with content when hovering over a trigger element.

components.name: Input
components.description: A standard text input field.

components.name: Label
components.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.

components.name: LoadingSkeleton
components.description: A placeholder loading component that displays animated skeleton shapes using the base Skeleton primitive.

components.name: LoadingSpinner
components.description: A customizable loading spinner component for indicating loading states

components.name: MetricsComparison
components.description: Displays a comparison between multiple metrics using tabs and line charts.

components.name: MetricsDashboard
components.description: A responsive dashboard layout for displaying multiple KPIs and metrics in a grid.

components.name: MobileMenu
components.description: Mobile navigation menu using Shadcn Sheet component.

components.name: NavigationMenu
components.description: A collection of links for primary website navigation, typically used in headers.

components.name: Pagination
components.description: Provides controls for navigating between pages of content.

components.name: Popover
components.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a click or focus on an element.

components.name: Progress
components.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task.

components.name: RadioGroup
components.description: A set of checkable buttons (radio buttons) where only one button can be checked at a time.

components.name: Resizable
components.description: Provides components for creating resizable panel layouts (Group, Panel, Handle).

components.name: ScrollArea
components.description: Augments native scroll functionality for customizing the appearance of scrollbars.

components.name: SearchBar
components.description: A search input component using Shadcn Input internally, with icon, optional clear button, loading state, and debouncing.

components.name: SectionHeader
components.description: A section header component for displaying a title, optional description, and optional icon.

components.name: Select
components.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

components.name: Separator
components.description: Visually or semantically separates content.

components.name: Sheet
components.description: Displays content that complements the main content, appearing from the side of the screen.

components.name: Slider
components.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

components.name: Switch
components.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and unchecked states.

components.name: Table
components.description: Renders data in a tabular format.

components.name: Tabs
components.description: A set of layered sections of content, known as tab panels, that display one panel of content at a time.

components.name: Textarea
components.description: A multi-line text input field.

components.name: ThemeToggle
components.description: A button that toggles between light and dark themes.

components.name: Toast
components.description: A succinct message that appears temporarily to provide feedback or updates.

components.name: Toaster
components.description: Renders toast notifications based on the `useToast` hook.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when focused or hovered.
